name.baseName: Pig production ; intensive feeding ; feed raw materials production
养猪生产 ; 集约化饲养 ; 饲料原料生产

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Large-scale intensive feeding in hilly and plain areas. It provides about 1.5% of Sichuan's commercial pigs, and plays a major role in modern pig farming in Sichuan. The main scenarios and parameters of this pig raising scenario are as follows: (1) Energy feed is mainly corn and other grains, all feed raw materials are purchased from outside the system, the feeding period is about 170d, and the average output is 95kg; ② The average number of listed is 5000 per year, most of the varieties are foreign three yuan hybrid pigs (such as DLY, a few are PIC commercial pigs), the slaughter rate is 76%, and the whole feed meat ratio is 3.0:1; ③ The feeding management is more advanced, the use of a large number of modern pig technology, generally self-breeding, the use of limit column and high bed feeding. ④ Fecal treatment and utilization: fecal and sewage anaerobic fermentation treatment. 70% is shipped out to return to the field (at present, this level has not been reached, assuming that this goal can be achieved in the next 5 years due to the strict implementation of environmental protection laws and regulations) long-term storage accounted for 45%, 30% after anaerobic fermentation treatment and put into the surrounding environment discharge water COD is 200mg/L.

丘陵区和平原区规模化集约化饲养。提供了四川大约1.5%的商品猪， 在四川养猪业中起着主要的现代养猪示范作用。这种养猪情景的主要情景状态和设定参数为： ①能量饲料以玉米等谷物为主，全部饲料原料从系统外购买，饲养期170d左右，出栏平均为95kg；②出栏数量平均为每年5000头，品种多数为洋三元杂交猪（如DLY，少数为PIC商品猪），屠宰率76%，全程料肉比3.0：1；③饲养管理上比较先进，采用了大量现代养猪技术，一般自繁自养，采用限位栏和高床饲养。④粪便处理及利用：粪便和污水进行厌氧发酵处理。70%运出还田（目前未达到这一水平，假设未来5年内由于环保法规的严厉执行可实现这一目标）长期存贮量占45%，30%经厌氧发酵处理后排放到周边环境排出水COD为 200mg/L。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: In this study, the functional unit (FU) was defined as "1kg pig carcass", which included skin, bone and fat. Foreign studies generally only considered lean meat, but in China's consumption mode, skin and viscera were also fully utilized as edible foods. The concept of carcass was adopted in this study. Although the bone included in this study is an inedible part, it can play a certain compensative role because it does not contain internal organs. In addition, the current data can be easily converted into carcass weight, so it is more in line with the actual situation.

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The average level of energy consumption and the amount of fertilizer, pesticide and mulch used in feed raw materials production in Sichuan Province was calculated according to China Statistical Yearbook 2006.
饲料原料生产的能量消耗和化肥、农药、地膜等使用量按《中国统计年鉴2006》计算四川平均水平。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Since the agricultural resource consumption is allocated according to the occupied land, the specific crop yield is no longer considered in scenario A, and the concentrated feed and the full-priced feed under various scenarios are converted into equivalent land area according to the corresponding average yield of main grains in the whole country or Sichuan province according to the set two situations.
由于本文按占用土地进行农资消耗分配，情景A中不再考虑具体的作物产量，各种情景下的浓缩饲料和全价饲料均按设定的两种情况按相应的全国或四川省内主要谷物平均产量折算成相当的土地面积。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Soybean meal (70%) and rapeseed meal (10%) were analyzed in concentrate, and other components were not considered. The components of the full price feed are mainly corn based grains (70%) and soybean meal (25%), and the other components are not considered. Minerals, disinfectants and various small equipment facilities are not included.
浓缩料中分析豆粕（70%）、菜籽粕（10%），其余成分没有考虑。全价饲料的成分主要是玉米为主的谷物（70%）和豆粕（25%），其余成分没有考虑。没有包括矿物质、消毒剂和各种小型设备设施。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set represents large-scale intensive pig production with the specific deployment in hilly and plain areas of Sichuan province. It is used to demonstrate modern pig farming practices and provides a reference output of commodity pigs, accounting for approximately 1.5% of Sichuan's production. Intensive breeding methods are adopted, using high bed feeding and limiting columns. The pigs, mainly foreign three-way hybrid pigs are raised for meat production, with the average pig sent to market weighing 95kg and an annual output of 5000 pigs. The feed is mainly grain-based, including corn, with all feed raw materials purchased from external sources. Environmental management practices include advanced anaerobic fermentation of waste and sewage. The information is applicable for businesses and researchers involved in pig farming, feed production, environmental management within the agricultural sector, and for policymakers designing sustainable agricultural practices.

该数据集代表四川省山丘和平原地区的大规模集约化养猪生产。它用于示范现代养猪实践，并提供商品猪的参考产量，占四川生产的约1.5%。采用集约养殖方法，使用高床饲养和限位栏。主要养殖的是洋三元杂交猪，目的是生产肉类，市场上平均每头猪重95公斤，年产5000头。饲料主要是以谷物为基础的，包括玉米，所有饲料原材料均从外部购买。环境管理实践包括粪便和污水的先进厌氧发酵处理。该信息适用于农业部门内养猪业务、饲料生产、环境管理的企业和研究人员，以及设计可持续农业实践的政策制定者。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: This study combined LCA methodology and scenario analysis method to conduct systematic environmental impact assessment for three typical pig production scenarios in Sichuan, explore the specific algorithms applied to the current environmental impact assessment of pig production, and reveal the environmentally friendly and unfavorable aspects of various pig production systems and their non-renewable energy utilization efficiency. The results are helpful to the understanding of environmental impact of pig industry and provide reference for the establishment of sustainable development model of pig industry.
本研究采用LCA方法学和情景分析法相结合的方式对四川三种典型的养猪生产 情景进行系统的环境影响评估，探索这种分析方法应用于当前养猪生产环境影响评估 时的具体算法，并揭示各种养猪生产系统中的环境友好和不利方面以及其不可更新能 源利用效率。研究结果有助于对养猪业环境影响态势的认识，并为养猪可持续发展模 式的建立提供参考。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: 1) The basic situation of Sichuan pig industry and the setting of various scenarios in this study, on the one hand, the opinions of a number of pig experts in Sichuan Province were solicited, and on the other hand, field investigations were carried out. 2) The relevant data in crop production are mainly from the 2005 statistics given in the annual yearbook. The production data of feed raw materials in Sichuan and the national average data are used to distinguish the two cases of raw materials coming from within the province and outside the province.
1）本研究中四川养猪业的基本情况和各种情景的设定，一方面征求了四川省多位养猪专家的意见，另一方面进行了实地调查。2）作物生产中的相关数据主要来自年年鉴中给出的2005年统计数据。四川的饲料原料生产数据和全国的平均数据用于区分原料来自省内和省外两种情况。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: The production data of feed raw materials in Sichuan and the national average data are used to distinguish the two cases of raw materials coming from within the province and outside the province. The consumption of agricultural materials is calculated according to the corresponding raw material consumption and the average yield of main grains in the whole country or Sichuan Province, and then calculated according to the area. Due to the large differences in the feed formulations used in the three scenarios, the assumption of the proportion of main raw material consumption was made, and then adjusted according to the sample survey data.
四川的饲料原料生产数据和全国的平均数据用于区分原料来自省内和省外两种情况。农资消耗量按相应的原料消耗量和全国或四川省内主要谷物平均产量折算成相当的土地面积，再按面积求得。由于三种情景中所用的饲料配方差异大，故进行了主要原料消耗比例的假设，然后根据抽样调查资料进行了调整。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 白林. 四川养猪业清洁生产系统LCA及猪粪资源化利用关键技术研究. (四川农业大学, 2007).
白林. 四川养猪业清洁生产系统LCA及猪粪资源化利用关键技术研究. (四川农业大学, 2007).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) of pig production, account for the following: 1) The Functional Unit (FU) defined as '1kg pig carcass', which includes skin, bone, and fat. Adjust comparisons and analyses for this FU when relating to other regional LCA studies that may consider only lean meat. 2) Regional variation in feed ingredient production, energy consumption, and agricultural input such as fertilizers and pesticides should be taken into account based on 2006 statistical yearbook data. 3) Environmental impacts associated with waste management should include the current scenario and projected improvements in the next five years due to stricter environmental regulations, with a focus on anaerobic fermentation of waste. 4) Crop yield data used for the calculation of agricultural resource consumption should be carefully applied as per scenario details provided. Always consider technological applicability, taking into account local standards and regulations for environmentally sound pig farming practices.

在使用该数据集进行养猪生产生命周期评估（LCA）时，应考虑以下事项：1) 将功能单元（FU）定义为“1kg猪胴体”，其中包括皮肤、骨骼和脂肪。在与可能只考虑瘦肉的其他地区LCA研究相关联时，调整比较和分析以适应本FU。2) 应基于2006年统计年鉴数据考虑地区间饲料原料生产、能源消耗和农业投入（如化肥和农药）的差异。3) 与废物管理相关的环境影响应包括目前的情景和由于环保法规更加严格而在未来五年内预计的改进，重点是废物的厌氧发酵。4) 应根据所提供的情景详细信息，谨慎应用用于计算农业资源消耗的作物产量数据。始终考虑技术适用性，考虑当地环保养猪实践的标准和规定。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 作为参考定量，非实际输出
